name: notebook-subtree-select
description: Enables selection of subtrees of cells in notebooks (eg, Jupyter)

commands.title: Select cell subtree
commands.description: Selects the subtree of cells starting from the current cell

commands.title: Go to next cell parent
commands.description: Navigates to the parent cell of the current cell

commands.title: Go to next cell forward and up
commands.description: Moves to the next sibling cell if present, or to parent cell

commands.title: Go to next cell backward and up
commands.description: Moves to the previous sibling cell if present, or to parent cell

commands.title: Go to next cell forward and over
commands.description: Moves to the next sibling cell if present, or to parent cell's next sibling

commands.title: Go to next breadth-first cell
commands.description: Navigates to the next cell using a breadth-first traversal

commands.title: Go to next depth-first cell
commands.description: Navigates to the next cell using a depth-first traversal

commands.title: Insert notebook heading below
commands.description: Inserts a heading cell below the current cell in the notebook

commands.title: Increment headings
commands.description: Increment the heading level of all selected markdown

commands.title: Decrement headings
commands.description: Decrement the heading level of all selected markdown

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
